IGNITE,Cultural fest Taarangana,Technical fest Innerve,Women safety activities

IGDTUW organizes a very vibrant cultural fest called Taarangana. Many cultural events including star night, dance competition, fashion competition, etc kept in this. Teams from outside universities participate in it.
University also organizes a technical fest, called Innerve. It has many event that are technical in nature.

IGNITE is the annual sports meet of IGDTUW. Every year it is organized at a very large scale. Students from different colleges participate in it. It is organized at JLN Stadium and we invited eminent sports persons as jury.
